Articles.Content:
At the Kerbal Aerospace Defense Corporation (aka KADEC), we strive to build fictional, yet realistic aircraft that actually fly! Our financial restructuring these couple of years will now see that you get quality products. (i.e this is an updated version of this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53833-KADEC-Kerbal-Aerospace-Defense-Corporation

Note

Currently undergoing maintenance as models are outdated. Please see post #17 for details http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94104-KADEC-Kerbal-Aerospace-Defense-Corporation?p=1699200&viewfull=1#post1699200

These craft are mod dependant. Please check the required mods under the corresponding craft spoiler.

Downloads

As for .craft download links, they will be located by the corresponding aircraft spolers.

Aircraft Status List:

KA-4C Uploaded

KF-8C/D Uploaded

KF-8E/F Uploaded

KT-8ALink Pending

KH-7ALink Pending

KF-7EUnder Testing

Aircraft Profiles and Pictures

Here is a list of active KADEC aircraft, so take a stroll down our "catalog".

Attack

The KA-4C is a two-seat ground attack aircraft. Real world equivalents equal the SEPECAT Jaguar, Xian JH-7 and the AMX International AMX

Required Mods

Stretchy Tanks: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57422

B9 Aerospace: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92630-0-24-2-B9-Aerospace-Release-5-2-1-%28updated-07-09-14%29

Modified JAWRD parts https://www.dropbox.com/s/y2pk6mypqpuq1ks/Other%20Parts.rar?dl=0

BD Armory: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-BDArmory-v0-5-2-Dev-Thread-(Aimers-Guard-mode)-Sept-10

Procedural Dynamics: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29862-0-24-Procedural-Dynamics-Procedural-Wing-0-8-1

Pics

Fighter

The KF-8 is a light multi-role fighter that comes in two version: KF-8C (single-seat) and KF-8D (two-seat). Real world equivalents equal the JAS-39C/D Gripen, F-16C/D Block 40 and the KAI TA-50.

Required Mods

B9 Aerospace: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92630-0-24-2-B9-Aerospace-Release-5-2-1-%28updated-07-09-14%29

The KF-8E/F are upgraded variants of the KF-8C and -8D. Dubbed the Super Kestrel, features such as a new engine and conformable fuel tanks distinguish it from the KF-8C and KF-8D. Real-world equivalents are the JAS-39E/F Gripen NG, the F-16E/F Block 60 and the KAI FA-50.

Required Mods

B9 Aerospace: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92630-0-24-2-B9-Aerospace-Release-5-2-1-%28updated-07-09-14%29

Helicopter

Transport and Utility

Tech Support (downloads, mods and other info)

Required Mods

These creations are extensively dependent on mods so please check the mods required under the corresponding spoilers. I am still trying to reduce mod dependency, but for now, these mods have been used in some craft files.

Firespitter: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24551-Firespitter-propeller-plane-and-helicopter-parts-v6-3-5-(Sep-1st)-for-KSP-0-24-2

B9 Aerospace: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92630-0-24-2-B9-Aerospace-Release-5-2-1-%28updated-07-09-14%29

BD Armory: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-BDArmory-v0-5-2-Dev-Thread-(Aimers-Guard-mode)-Sept-10

Tweak Scale: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80234-24-2-TweakScale-Rescale-Everything!-(v1-43-2014-08-23-52-UTC)

Stretchy Tanks: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57422

Procedural Dynamics: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29862-0-24-Procedural-Dynamics-Procedural-Wing-0-8-1

You will also need my modified JAWRD parts (originaly made by user JellyGoggles: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/4542-JellyCubes-Advanced-Weapons-R-D-Weapons-and-Other-Miscellanea)

Here is the LINK: https://www.dropbox.com/s/y2pk6mypqpuq1ks/Other%20Parts.rar?dl=0

Recommended Mods

Here is a list of recommended, but not essential mods. These give an extra touch of realism to the game IMO.

KerbPaint: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50008-0-23-KerbPaint-Paint-layering-for-parts-(September-23rd)-(Same-Old-Still-Works!)

My own updated KerbPaint .cfg for extra paint-able stuff: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4bxxu8d3s38kagr/KerbPaint.cfg?dl=0

RasterPropMonitor: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57603

Very nice job, the crafts are amazing. I can't wait to see more!

Thanks!

The KF-8E/F should be up soon.

Oh btw, I don't know if anyone else has this problem, but me and a few of my friends cant get on curse at all. There's some sort of syncing error some people get when they try to get on curse.

The only mod I cant download is romfarer lazer. If you know of an alternate download for it or if you could provide a lite version without romfarer parts that would be great!

Its quite a shame, a lot of my favorite mods only have curse download

Download directly from the curse website and use winRAR to unzip the file.

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/category/gameplay

How i go about downloading mods, other than that you could ask OP to upload the mods to his mediafire account.

Also all the mods on Curse can be found here on the forums, just google the mod name EG: "KSP Forums romfarer lazer systems .24.2"
Everything's cool, but... Tooo many mods)
How about lite versions without Romfarer, BDArmory, Infinite Dice and Strerchy Tanks :\

No I have never been able to get on curse that's the problem. It always says "The connection was reset" whenever I try to get on the site. Its not that i cant download anything or find the links, its just that I could never connect to the site in the first place.

I can see all the download links on the forum for mods but whenever its a link to a curse download and I click on it, it just brings me to "The connection was reset" or some random error (even if I type in the url, google it, or use another browser). Ive searched everywhere to figure out what the problem is and Ive been out of luck, Im thinking it may be a problem with my firewall blocking the site, but I have no clue how to fix it (trust me Ive tried). Its alot easier just asking for an alternate download on mediafire or dropbox.

How about lite versions without Romfarer, BDArmory, Infinite Dice and Strerchy Tanks :\

I would be fine with BDArmory since I cant live without it XD

Edited September 20, 2014 by freakazoid13

Updates!

Okay. So I've removed Romfarer, B12 and Infinite Dice dependency on all uploaded craft. The KF-8E and KF-8F have been uploaded and they are also non-dependent on said mods.

Also some minor modifications have been made to the KF-8C/D and KA-4C:

KA-4C Update:

Added a new 30mm gun to the centerline. It now has 33% more BRRRRRPPPPP!

KF-8C/D Update:

New wing root and longer wingspan = better maneuverability

Edited September 25, 2014 by AirShark
:cool:Hats off to you my friend! Very nice work. Trust me As a fellow builder it's hard some times to look good and still fly.
Thanks! It was tough to get those two elements working perfectly XD
That's a seriously impressive roster of aircraft.
Is this thread dead?

It's hibernating

I haven't had a lot of time to work on the models due to my studies and stuff, but I have updated some .24 models to .25 (it's only a matter of updating it). I can't promise when I'll have the new links up, but it shouldn't be too long.
Thanks, that's what I thought, really looking forward to the, well all the new planes you make i guess, i love the super kestrel, my favorite so far
I love your eye for realism. One of your craft actually looks like the Tiawanese F-CK-1 Ching-Kuo fighter. Impressive work!

KADEC stirs back to life:

Developments

I have been very busy these last couple of months, but I have started to work on KADEC once again. I can update the old models to KSP .90 compatibility or I can begin work on a new set of aircraft that work using FAR.

Here is an example of what I mean.

New KF-9E Block 10

This is a new interpretation of the KF-9 Kestrel. This jet is larger, but is also much faster and more agile than the original KF-9 when using FAR. It can also carry a larger weapon load due to the larger wings and extra fuel.

Pics

KF-9E Prototype FTV-2 (Flight Test Vehicle 2)

KF-9E Block 10 Initial Production and Evaluation Variant

KF-9E Block 10 IPEV during weapon tests.

The KF-9E handles much more realistically than the original KF-9.

As stated before, this jet will fly 'properly' in FAR and should work well in Vanilla KSP. Now this is a road I am willing to take; making more realistic aircraft that perform realistically on FAR OR I can continue with my original non FAR aircraft. As always, it would be great to get some people to try the jets out and offer feedback on their performance; this would be more valuable to me if I were to go down the FAR path. All in all, it won't really matter to me if I stick with vanilla KSP or FAR; it is all up to what you guys prefer

Edited January 28, 2015 by AirShark
